pre_install:
"& `"$(scoop which pythonw)`" -m idlelib.idle @args" | Out-File "$dir\idle.ps1"

        $shortcut = (New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell).CreateShortcut("$dir\idle.lnk")
        $shortcut.TargetPath = convert-path (scoop which pythonw)
        $shortcut.Arguments = "-m idlelib.idle"
        $shortcut.IconLocation = join-path ([System.IO.Path]::GetDirectoryName((convert-path (scoop which pythonw)))) '\lib\idlelib\icons\idle.ico'
        $shortcut.Save()
